description:
Lina`s party learns about the presence of a high level monster an evil Dragon Lord called Garp behind the series of recent evil activity.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kindan no Dance? Saikyou Jumon wa Doko Da!
La danse interdite (Ou la formule suprême)
The Forbidden Dance? Where Is the Strongest Spell!
Запретный танец? Где же сильнейшее заклинание?!
禁断のダンス? 最強呪文はどこだ!
